briefdescription.para: Qcorr is a friend class of this ImgLabel class, so all members from ImgLabel are accessible by a Qcorr object.
Pointer to Main Window Object (There should be only one on these).
the rubberBand object.
rubberBand's top-left corner point
rubberBand's bottom-right corner point
the coordinates of the current mouse pointer when it's pressed (held-down)
Top-left corner of the label.
Bottom-right corner of the label.
First mouse position point of the template selection.
Final mouse position point of the template selection.
indicates whether the mouse is currently being pressed (held-down)
indicates whether the template selection has begun
indicates whether the mouse pointer is inside the rubberBand selection area
indicates whether the mouse pointer is at the top edge of the rubberBand selection area
indicates whether the mouse pointer is at the bottom edge of the rubberBand selection area
indicates whether the mouse pointer is at the left edge of the rubberBand selection area
indicates whether the mouse pointer is at the right edge of the rubberBand selection area
indicates whether the rubberBand is enabled/disabled.
X-value used in the rubberBand movement.
Y-value used in the rubberBand movement.
Constructor of ImgLabel class must point to a Qcorr parentWindow.
Allows to enable/disable the ImgLabel's rubberBand selection functionality.

parameterdescription.para: boolean flag to enable or disable the rubberBand selection functionality.

briefdescription.para: Sets a group of flags used for the mouse pointer in relation to the template's region and edges.
Used to check the mouse pointer in relation to the template's region and edges.

Displays the XY-coordinates of the mouse pointer on the status bar Displays the XY-coordinates of the mouse pointer (relative to the ImgLabel) in the status bar of the friend-parent's main window. It only display the mouse pointer coordinate information if rubberBand actions are enabled.

parameterdescription.para: the coordinates of the origin point of the rubberBand selection
the coordinates of the final point of the rubberBand selection

briefdescription.para: press mouse event handler
move mouse event handler
release mouse event handler
A sub-classed label widget implemented with the purpose of displaying the reference image on the left panel.

detaileddescription.para: A sub-classed label widget implemented with the purpose of displaying the reference image on the left panel with added functionality such as the rubberBand selection and coordinate tracking of the mouse pointer.
